name: The singing Sword
description:
A young Warrior from a poor Village finds the Legendary singng Sword and goes on a great Adventure. On his jorney he encounters various allies, including a Wise Sage, a famouse Knight and the former leader of the land.
What our hero doesn't know is that an unknown evil Emporer is planning to banish all of his people into a dark realm. Will our hero succeed or will all of his kind be banished? Only time can tell.

This game features:

- 3-4 hours of gameplay

- A very unique and interesting Story

- A unique twist on the classic turn based combat

- A never seen Save system, that turns even saving your game into a fun gameplay experience

- 4 legendary heros

- A massive immersive world

- Lots of Weapons and Armor to chose from

- Powerful super moves like SONG OF DEATH and ULTIMA HEAL

- 5 Dungeons

- More than 6 challanging Bossfights

- One of the most epic plottwists in gaming at the end of the game

WARNING: While easy early on, this game requires strategic use of your special attacks and management of MP. You can't expect to win through Button mashing!!!

This game contains strong language, blood, mention of drugs and political themes, so it might not be suited for very young children.

Don't forget to comment the game
